values: It Is Still Well with My Soul: Funeral Message for Perpetua BrotenIt Is Still Well with My Soul: Funeral Message for Perpetua Broten

When a child dies, how can it still be well with our souls? Pastor John offers six soul-steadying realities in a funeral for a precious twelve-year-old.When a child dies, how can it still be well with our souls? Pastor John offers six soul-steadying realities in a funeral for a precious twelve-year-old.
